Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T1.NOME_RAZAO, T1.CGCCPF, T2.NRCERTIF, T2.DTQITBCO, T2.NRPROPOS FROM seguros.v0cliente T1, seguros.v0opcaopagva T2, seguros.v0apolice T3 WHERE t2.codclien = t1.cod_cliente AND t2.nrcertif IN (SELECT nrcertif FROM seguros.v0opcaopagva WHERE agectadeb = :VLN0W899.AGECTADEB AND oprctadeb = :VLN0W899.OPRCTADEB AND numctadeb = :VLN0W899.NUMCTADEB) AND t2.NUM_APOLICE = t3.num_apolice AND t2.codsubes = t3.codsubes AND t3.CODPRODAZ = 'AES' END SQL
